definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Seals are an essential part of the spin pack operation.
sentences.chinese: 密封圈是网片不可或缺的一部分。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effect of cranioplasty with titanium mesh.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨钛合金网片颅骨成形术的临床效果。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the degradation of vicryl mesh and vicryl-collagen mesh.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察薇乔网片及其胶原蛋白复合物的降解。

sentences.english: The present paper deals with the reaction of juvenile grass carp to setnets using 3 kinds of abating.
sentences.chinese: 初步研究了草鱼幼鱼对三种缩结定置网片的反应特性。

sentences.english: Mesh was fixed to central petal of Plug.
sentences.chinese: 网塞中央花瓣和网片固定。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of prolene mesh in treating incisional hernia.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结应用聚丙烯网片修补腹壁切口疝的体会。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the therapeutic effect of tension-free hernioplasty for oblique inguinal hernia by bistratal polypropylene mesh.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结双层聚丙烯网片修补腹股沟斜疝的手术疗效。

definition: a boom (i.e. transverse beam for hanging objects)
